arStrings.szText: {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} damaging enemies for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds. While standing in {c_important}Earthquakes{/c}, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

{c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} damaging enemies for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds.
